snippet.title: By Fire & Sword © 1985 Avalon Hill - PC DOS - Gameplay
snippet.description:
DESCRIPTION
By Fire & Sword is a Strategy game, developed by Microcomputer Games Inc. and published by Avalon Hill, which was released in 1985.
